Many [[dragon]]s of [[Argonnessen]]
believe they can attain immortality after death, passing through
[[Dolurrh]] and becoming [[divine beings|Sovereign archetype]]. However, some aren't
willing to take that chance; using an [[eldritch machine]] hidden
deep in Argonnessen, the most powerful can perform a ritual
that tethers their spirits to a psychic anchor in [[Dal Quor]]. This
Draconic [[Eidolon|eidolon]], a monument in the [[Ocean of Dreams]] created ages ago by a cadre of [[gold dragon]]s, holds the souls of dragons long dead instead of releasing them
to Dolurrh. The dragons no longer exist physically; like the [[Undying Court]], they're a union of spirits, possessing greater power together than they would individually. They can't leave
the Eidolon, but possess vast knowledgeâ€”secrets of history, insight into the [[Prophecy|Draconic Prophecy]], and knowledge of epic magic. They
have much to offer, but what do adventurers have that the dreams of dead dragons might want?
title: Draconic Eidolon
